groupDetails.description: Monitor a GIT repository and validate PRs, raising JIRA bug and twitter notification if errors found

endpoints.description: Endpoint to get a file associated with a commit
endpoints.name: gitfile

endpoints.description: Endpoint to change status of a commit on a PR
endpoints.name: gitprstate

endpoints.description: Endpoint to get files associated with a PR
endpoints.name: gitprfiles

endpoints.description: Endpoint to change status of a commit on a PR
endpoints.name: gitprstate

groupDetails.name: ValidateGITPR

policyDetails.description: This policy will validate a GIT PR.
policyDetails.name: ValidatePR

policyDefinitions.ValidatePR:
<route id="ValidatePR">
	<from uri="endpoint:gitpr"/>
	<to uri="endpoint:gitprfiles" />
	<split parallelProcessing="true">
		<simple>${body}</simple>
		<log message="Processing item ${body}" />
        <choice>
        	<when>
            	<simple>${body.filename.endsWith(".wsdl")}</simple>
				<to uri="direct:ValidateWSDL" />
            </when>
        </choice>
	</split>
	<transform>
		<simple>Validated changes for PR #${header.GitHubPullRequest}</simple>
	</transform>
	<to uri="endpoint:gitprstate?state=success"/>
</route>

<route id="ValidateWSDL" >
	<from uri="direct:ValidateWSDL" />
    <to uri="endpoint:gitfile" />
    <log message="WSDL File contents: ${body}" />
    <transform>
    	<mvel>new io.scepta.samples.utilities.WSDLValidator().validate(request.body)</mvel>
    </transform>
	<split parallelProcessing="true">
		<simple>${body}</simple>
		<log message="Processing issue ${body}" />
		<to uri="endpoint:gitprcomment" />
	</split>
</route>
